en.name: Hakushin Ring
en.passiveDescription: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a {{10//12.5//15//17.5//20%}} Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.

zh.name: 白辰之环
zh.passiveDescription: 装备该武器的角色触发雷元素相关反应后，队伍中附近的与该元素反应相关的元素类型的角色，获得{{10//12.5//15//17.5//20%}}对应元素的元素伤害加成，持续6秒。通过这种方式，角色获得的元素伤害加成无法叠加。
